analyzed: kaḥ ayam kā asmi ratam nu vā katham iti su alpā api me na smṛtiḥ

original: prāsāde sā diśi diśi ca sā pṛṣṭhataḥ sā puraḥ sā
analyzed: prāsāde sā diśi diśi ca sā pṛṣṭhatas sā puras sā

original: paryaṅke sā pathi pathi ca sā tadviyogāturasya /
analyzed: paryaṅke sā pathi pathi ca sā tad viyoga āturasya

original: haṃho cetaḥ prakṛtiraparā nāsti me kāpi sā sā
analyzed: haṃho cetaḥ prakṛtiḥ aparā nā asti me kā api sā sā

original: sā sā sā sā jagati sakale ko'yamadvaitavādaḥ //105//(102) ***
analyzed: sā sā sā sā jagati sakale kaḥ ayam advaita vādaḥ

original: Verses found in Arjunavarmadeva's version not found here
analyzed: verses found in arjunavarmadeva version not found here
aṅguli agra nakhena bāṣpa salilam vikṣipya vikṣipya kim

original: tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi /
analyzed: tūṣṇīm rodiṣi kopane bahutaram phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi
yasyāḥ te piśuna upadeśa vacanaiḥ māne ati bhūmim gate
nirviṇṇaḥ anunayam prati priyatamaḥ madhyastha tām eṣyate

original: tadvaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pādayos
analyzed: tad vaktra abhimukham mukham vinamitam dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pādayoḥ
tasya ālāpa kutūhala ākulatare śrotre niruddhe mayā

original: pāṇibhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ
analyzed: pāṇibhyām ca tiraskṛtaḥ sa pulakaḥ sveda udgamaḥ gaṇḍayoḥ

original: sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti śatadhā yatkañcuke sandhayaḥ //(11)
analyzed: sakhyaḥ kim karavāṇi yānti śatadhā yat kañcuke sandhayaḥ
na apetaḥ anunayena yaḥ priya suhṛd vākyaiḥ na yaḥ

original: yo dīrghaṃ divasaṃ viṣahya viṣamaṃ yatnātkathaṃciddhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ dīrgham divasam viṣahya viṣamam yatnāt kathaṃcid hṛtaḥ
anyonyasya hṛte mukhe nihitayoḥ tiryak kathaṃcid dṛśoḥ
sa dvābhyām ati vismṛta vyatikaraḥ mānaḥ vihasya ujjhitaḥ
rātrau vāri bhara alasa ambuda rava udvignena jāta aśruṇā
pānthena ātma viyoga duḥkha piśunam gītam tathā utkaṇṭhayā
āstām jīvita hāriṇaḥ pravasana ālāpasya saṃkīrtanam

original: mānasyāpi jalāñjaliḥ sarabhasaṃ lokena datto yathā //(54)
analyzed: mānasya api jala añjaliḥ sarabhasam lokena dattaḥ yathā
kim svātantryāt tathā gṛham āgataḥ
caraṇa patitaḥ prema ārdra ārdraḥ priyaḥ samupekṣitaḥ
tat idam adhunā yāvajjīvam nirasta sukha udayā
rudita śaraṇā durjātānām sahasva ruṣām phalam
āstām viśvasanam sakhīṣu vidita abhiprāya sāre jane

original: tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ suracitāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā /
analyzed: tatra api arpayitum dṛśam su racitām śaknomi na vrīḍayā
lokaḥ api eṣa para upahāsa caturaḥ sūkṣma iṅgita jñaḥ api alam

original: mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ //(63)
analyzed: mātar kam śaraṇam vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇaḥ anurāga analaḥ
analpa cintā bhara moha niścalā vilokyamānā eva karoti sādhvasam

original: svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari //(65)
analyzed: svabhāva śobhā anatimātra bhūṣaṇā tanuḥ tava iyam bata kim nu sundari
iti priye pṛcchati māna vihvalā kathaṃcid antar dhṛta bāṣpa gadgadam

original: na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yadvadhūḥ kiyanna tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam //(66)
analyzed: na kiṃcid iti eva jagāda yat vadhūḥ kiyat na tena eva tayā asya varṇitam
an ālocya premṇaḥ pariṇatim an ādṛtya suhṛdaḥ

original: tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tvayā akāṇḍe mānaḥ kim iti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ
samākṛṣṭāḥ hi ete viraha dahana udbhāsura śikhāḥ
sva hastena aṅgārāḥ tat alam adhunā araṇyaruditaiḥ
subh sad sū su
